title: The declaration or remonstrance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled with divers depositions and letters thereunto annexed.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott and John Wright,
notes: Also published with titles: A remonstrance of the state of the kingdome ... 19 May, 1642; A declaration or remonstrance of the state of the kingdome; and A remonstrance or declaration of the state of the kingdome.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
